### level 3
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly) 

iris_plot <- function(){
  
  return((iris %>% 
    ggplot() + 
    geom_point(aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length, color =  Species)) + 
    annotate("segment", x = 1, xend = 20, y = 1, yend = 20)) %>% 
  ggplotly())
  
}

 (iris %>% 
    ggplot() + 
    geom_point(aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length, color = Species)) + 
    annotate("segment", x = 1, xend = 20, y = 1, yend = 20)) %>% 
  ggplotly()

iris_plot()
```
